meanings.sent1: The new jacket is very fashionable among my friends.
meanings.sent2: She always wears fashionable clothes to school.
meanings.sent3: Even the dog looked fashionable in its tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were as fashionable as a neon sign in a dark alley.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline was a fashionable display of lights and colors.

meanings.definition: Conforming to the current trends or styles
meanings.sent1: His outfit was so fashionable that everyone noticed him.
meanings.sent2: The store sells only fashionable accessories.
meanings.sent3: The penguin tried to be fashionable by wearing a bow tie.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as fashionable as a melody in a quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a fashionable blend of colors and scents.

meanings.definition: In accordance with the latest fashion trends
meanings.sent1: The designer's collection was truly fashionable this season.
meanings.sent2: Being fashionable is important to her.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to be fashionable by wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as fashionable as a bright sunrise.
meanings.sent5: The painting was a fashionable mix of bold strokes and vibrant hues.
